reviews.review: Just amazing from start to finish
Cant relive they pulled it off. Amazing movie.

Defiantly the first part of a two part movie. Many scenes are thrilling and the film balances all the different events going on. With so many characters, it sacrafices screen time more many of them but this seems to be more of Thanos' movie more so than the Avengers movie. Overall the plot twists and homage to the comics makes it a top MCU movie and celebrates what a journey it has been while reminding us there is still a bunch of story yet to be told.

This movie was like a roller coaster--- It was suspenseful, thrilling and dramatic. Everything I thought they wouldn't do. I loved every Marvel movie except for Captain America: The first Avenger, and I thought this would be a mindless 3 hour slog of action, where the Villain's stupid and there's nothing to enjoy. I didn't even think anything truly game-changing would happen. Boy, was I wrong. It was a perfect film, Better than Black Panther and even better than Logan.Without ruining everything, all I can say is it is surprising. And it's a Game changer.
best MCU team up movie since Civil War!!!
I’m hooked on Marvel. Loved the story line and I can’t wait for the next one.

Well, you have to admit.  There's a ton of stuff going on in Infinity War.  The biggest difficulty I had was that despite the movie's focus on the Infinity Stones, the story line seemed to lack focus.  Admittedly, there was a lot of ground the Russo brothers had to cover and, overall, they did so commendably.  I would imagine that some audience reactions and ratings may be due to the ending, which, in the sense of "superhero movies", doesn't really end "superhero-like".  But it's not meant to and is intentionally a cliffhanger for the Avengers 4 movie next year.  The highlights of this movie were Hemsworth, Pratt, Bautista, Holland, Bettany, and Olsen.  I've already seen it twice and intend at least two more viewings in the theater.  .

The best Marvel movie to date. 

Amazing action scenes. 
Every character was well utilized. 
Thanos was spectacular. 
The darker tone was overall better for the movie. 

The only reason this movie can't get a full 5 stars is because sometimes comedy scenes dragged out, even though they weren't funny. (Drax claiming to be invisible wasn't funny but it still took 2 minutes out of my life regardless.) 

The movie became more and more focused as it went on. I wish it was that the whole time.

Words can not describe the range of emotions I felt during this film. Brilliant characters and stellar storytelling. A true movie for any fan of any size. The Russo Brothers have truly made a masterpiece to be proud of. Cannot wait for what comes next
